title: Fixing a broken system – Mahmee CEO Melissa Hanna on patient-centric maternal care | E1464
description: Molly Wood sits down with Melissa Hanna, CEO and Co-Founder of Mahmee, a care network for parents (01:44), they discuss the impetus for Melissa launching the company (12:34), the challenges of bringing the product to market (22:08), how she built the network and more (37:29)!
